memberdef.argsstring: (int &argc, char **&argv, WorkerCountType in_num_workers=no_workers, bool const interop_mode=false, MPI_Comm *in_comm=nullptr, RuntimeInstType const in_instance=RuntimeInstType::DefaultInstance)
memberdef.name: Runtime

simplesect.para: has been initialized and not subsequently finalized

briefdescription.para: Reset the runtime after termination is reached to use it again.
Abortdie immediately after spitting out error message.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string const abort_str, ErrorCodeType const code, bool error=false, bool decorate=true, bool formatted=true)
memberdef.name: output

briefdescription.para: Output a message and possibly die.

parameterdescription.para: whether it's already formatted or not

briefdescription.para: The VT runtime that manages startup/shutdown and pointers to all the live components for a runtime instance.

detaileddescription.para: The runtime contains an instance of VT that is initialized/finalized. It performs the sequence of operations for correct initialization and finalization of all the components that make up a runtime.
The runtime can be configured to catch signals when errors occur and dump a stack trace.
